content:
Here are ten popular online travel agencies (OTAs) that people often visit when planning a trip:

1. Expedia
2. Orbitz
3. Travelocity
4. Priceline
5. Kayak
6. Booking.com
7. Hotels.com
8. Agoda
9. Trivago
10. Airbnb

It's worth noting that the popularity of OTAs can vary by region, and the list above is intended to be a general overview of popular options. It's also worth considering that many people use multiple OTAs and other websites when planning a trip, as they may compare prices and options across different platforms. In addition to OTAs, people may also visit individual hotel and resort websites, tourism boards, and destination marketing organizations to gather information about their vacation options.
